lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Tender Loving Care also said <Norrell Corp> agreed not to acquire any additional Staff Builders shares until September 30, adding Norrell was paid 750,000 dlrs for the standstill arrangement.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Upon clearance of the revised proxy statement by the commission and its distribution to Staff Builders' shareholders, that company's management will continue to solicit proxies for approval of the merger.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: As announced February 26, the Staff Builders shareholders meeting to vote on the merger, originally convened and adjourned December 23, will be reconvened on April 22.
